name: Pink One Direction Gmail
description: For 1D fans. Check out my Pink One Direction Facebook here, YouTube here and Google here. IMPORTANT NOTE: If you have adblock plus, create an exception for @@https://mail.google.com or the style won't display properly as I have used the ad space for the image. This style works best with the gmail light theme (change theme in gmail settings). Select your monitor size below.
